title: 服务器报错，崩溃
author: 1wmz
txt_content:
[12:52:34 错误] Error occurred while disabling Shopkeepers v2.2.2 (Is it up to date?)
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Cannot remove entities while the ai task is running!] 
at org.apache.commons.lang.Validate.isTrue(Validate.java:136) ~[PaperSpigot-1.11.2-1031.jar:git-Paper-1031] 
at com.nisovin.shopkeepers.shopobjects.living.LivingEntityAI.removeEntity(LivingEntityAI.java:362) ~[?:?] 
at com.nisovin.shopkeepers.shopobjects.living.SKLivingShopObject.cleanupAI(SKLivingShopObject.java:241) ~[?:?] 
at com.nisovin.shopkeepers.shopobjects.living.SKLivingShopObject.despawn(SKLivingShopObject.java:262) ~[?:?] 
at com.nisovin.shopkeepers.shopkeeper.AbstractShopkeeper.despawn(AbstractShopkeeper.java:482) ~[?:?] 
at com.nisovin.shopkeepers.shopkeeper.SKShopkeeperRegistry.despawnAllShopkeepers(SKShopkeeperRegistry.java:396) ~[?:?] 
at com.nisovin.shopkeepers.SKShopkeepersPlugin.onDisable(SKShopkeepersPlugin.java:260) ~[?:?] 
at org.bukkit.plugin.java.JavaPlugin.setEnabled(JavaPlugin.java:273) ~[PaperSpigot-1.11.2-1031.jar:git-Paper-1031] 
at org.bukkit.plugin.java.JavaPluginLoader.disablePlugin(JavaPluginLoader.java:344) [PaperSpigot-1.11.2-1031.jar:git-Paper-1031] 
at org.bukkit.plugin.SimplePluginManager.disablePlugin(SimplePluginManager.java:427) [PaperSpigot-1.11.2-1031.jar:git-Paper-1031] 
at org.bukkit.plugin.SimplePluginManager.disablePlugins(SimplePluginManager.java:420) [PaperSpigot-1.11.2-1031.jar:git-Paper-1031] 
at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_11_R1.CraftServer.disablePlugins(CraftServer.java:347) [PaperSpigot-1.11.2-1031.jar:git-Paper-1031] 
at net.minecraft.server.v1_11_R1.MinecraftServer.stop(MinecraftServer.java:477) [PaperSpigot-1.11.2-1031.jar:git-Paper-1031] 
at org.spigotmc.RestartCommand.restart(RestartCommand.java:121) [PaperSpigot-1.11.2-1031.jar:git-Paper-1031] 
at org.spigotmc.RestartCommand.restart(RestartCommand.java:40) [PaperSpigot-1.11.2-1031.jar:git-Paper-1031] 
at org.spigotmc.WatchdogThread.run(WatchdogThread.java:97) [PaperSpigot-1.11.2-1031.jar:git-Paper-1031] 

求解！出了什么问题，怎么解决.非常感谢！！

replies.author: 泽辰zechen呀
replies.txt_content: shopkeeper除了问题 更改版本就行了
